page.shortlink: api a5 create tempfile function source
page.description: Creates a temporary file with the specified extension. If extension is not specified, then extension of .tmp is used. If folder is not specified, then uses Windows temp folder. File is automatically deleted when A5 is closed.

argument.name: extension
argument.description: Default = ".tmp". The file extension for the temporary file.

argument.name: folder
argument.description: Default = Windows temp folder. Location to create the file.

argument.name: flagUseGuid
argument.description: If true, the generated file name is a GUID.

description.p: Returns the fully qualified temporary file name.
